entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
